duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and drive larger, more complex construction projects under general direction, ensuring overall performance and adherence to standardized procedures and processes.
Work with Project Sponsors, Business Development, and Project Delivery Teams to identify and deliver program objectives.
Manage risks, establish project recovery plans, and mentor project team to benefit future project leaders.
Ensure accurate and timely reporting of assigned projects and make presentations to Executive Management on current and forecasted performance.
Continually seek and capitalize upon opportunities to deepen client relationships and increase customer satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Construction, Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, Construction Management, or Architecture (Master’s degree preferred)
Certification as a PMI Project Management Professional (PMP) is highly preferred
